content.text: After their shock defeat to Huddersfield mid-week , the Wanderers will be looking to bounce back against the struggling Bluebirds CARDIFF 'S relegation battle continues against Wolves . Neil Warnock wants his side to go to war against Wolves , looking for players to be " in the trenches " but Nuno Espirito Santo 's men will certainly be up for the fight after their recent loss to Huddersfield . THIS Premier League battle will be held on Saturday , March 2 . It falls under the 3pm blanket ban for coverage , although here at SunSport we will be running a LIVE BLOG . Wolves currently have no injuries or suspensions . Cardiff will be pleased to see Oumar Niasse , Joe Ralls , Harry Arter and Victor Camarasa back and ready for action this weekend .
